channel.title: What do i add
channel.description: What do i add if i want to make something a "Level Requirement" i'm not talking about weapons/armor i'm talking about like Tree,Willows Etc. Etc. like i want to give a Mith Rock Level 50 to Mine it.

item.title: What do i add
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

if(playerLevel[LEVELNUMBER] >= LEVEL) { CODE HERE } else if(playerLevel[LEVELNUMBER] <= LEVEL-1) sendMessage("You need the correct level for this!"); {

Replace LEVELNUMBER with the number of the level that you want. Replace LEVEL with the level you want the person to have to do this. Replace LEVEL-1 with the level that you want them to do it, except minus one. So if you want them to have level 10, you’d replace LEVEL-1 with 9.

Attacklvl = 0 Strengthlvl = 2 Defencelvl = 1 Hitpointslvl = 3 Prayerlvl = 5 Magiclvl = 6 Rangelvl = 4 Runecraftlvl = 20 Herblorelvl = 15 Theivinglvl = 17 Agilitylvl = 16 Craftinglvl = 12 Fletchinglvl = 9 Slayerlvl = 18 Mininglvl = 14 Smithinglvl = 13 Fishinglvl = 10 Cookinglvl = 7 Firemakinglvl = 11 Woodcuttinglvl = 8 Farminglvl = 19

There’s the level numbers

Read full topic

@Sparky_gp wrote:

You get the item id and you put a stat. Like

"If (stat # = #)
{mine mith rock}

That is not close to it but you get the idea.

~Sparky_gp
